dt-event.name: dtsb-inserted
dt-event.summary: An element from the init function has been inserted into the dom

type.scope: HTML element created in the `-init searchBuilder.conditions[type].init` function

dt-event.description: This event is triggered whenever one of the elements created in the `-init searchBuilder.conditions[type].init` is inserted by SearchBuilder. The event is triggered on the original element, so it is best to access the event within the init function itself.

example.title: Initialise Select2 on a Select Element Once Inserted
